title: Canadian Stocks Fall Most Since Tariff Turmoil Amid Metals Rout
description: Canadian stocks had their worst day since the market chaos in the wake of April’s tariff announcement, as a slide in precious metals sent mining stocks tumbling.
content: Canadian stocks had their worst day since the market chaos in the wake of April’s tariff announcement, as a slide in precious metals sent mining stocks tumbling.
